remarks: A helper lemma for the value of a recursive definition generator on upper integers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)
statement:
om2uz.1 $e |- C e. ZZ $.
om2uz.2 $e |- G = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) |` _om ) $.
uzrdg.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
uzrdg.2 $e |- R = ( rec ( ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> <. ( x + 1 ) , ( x F y ) >. ) , <. C , A >. ) |` _om ) $.
uzrdglem $p |- ( B e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) -> <. B , ( 2nd ` ( R ` ( `' G ` B ) ) ) >. e. ran R ) $.
$d A y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G y $.
